item.description:
This 30 mile ride will start out in at the Minute Man National Park Main Parking Area and Visitor Center.

Folks should plan to meet at 8:30 am and be ready to ride around 8:45 am. We should return to the parking area no later than 1:00 pm. This gives us time for breaks and assumes riders can keep a reasonable pace on this somewhat hilly ride.

Starting location: Minute Man National Park Visitor Center Parking area

http://goo.gl/maps/YLJu

The route:
http://goo.gl/maps/74ZM


Route Summary:
We will ride thru Lincoln and pass by the Codman House and stop at Walden Pond (shaded picnic area) for a brief break. We will continue on to Concord Center and then travel via scenic back roads to Kimballs Ice Cream [http://www.kimballfarm.com/carlisle.shtml 343 Bedford Rd in Carlisle] or Fern's Country Store [ 8 Lowell Street in Carlisle, just a short distance from main road]. Where we stop will be a group decision made at the start of ride. We will then ride past the North Bridge and then back to our starting point at Minute Man National Park Visitor Center.

After Ride Option
Main streets Market and Cafe
42 Main Street, Concord, MA
mainstreetsmarketandcafe.com


What's required
------------------------------------
Bike helmets and a bike in good repair

minimum 2 full water bottles (cold!).


What's recommended:
------------------------------------
Road bikes are a good choice for this ride

Water, spare tire, repair kit, sun screen, snacks, energy bars, rain gear, an extra layer, a bike lock, and a cell phone.

See you then

P.S.

Rain will cancel, so let's hope for good weather! As of today, looks like high of 78 for Saturday, partly cloudy.
item.name: Concord, Lincoln and Carlisle Ride
